ArgonTest.Name: Static/Instance Mixed
ArgonTest.InputSource:
import Argon.Core/*
class MyClass <: Object
static
public proc self.say_hello(): Unit do puts 'Hello' end
instance
public new() end
public proc self.say_world(): Unit do puts 'World' end
end
proc main(): Unit do MyClass.say_hello() MyClass.new().say_world() end
